title_advert: ['Single row E1 in a private location fully paid']
location1: ['Sidra Villas IDubai, Dubai Hills Estate, Sidra Villas']
amenities: ['Unfurnished\nMaids Room']
descriptions:
['DescriptionPH Real Estate are very pleased to be able to offer this single row E1 villa in Sidra 1 which is offered for sale giving a private location and vacant on transfer.  The owner of the property is motivated to sell the property having purchased it directly from the developer at considerably more than the asking price.
Sidra is the latest of the villa communities to be handed over in the prestigious Dubai Hills estate and the location cannot be rivaled with a commuter being able to drive to Downtown inside of 15 minutes.
The E1 is the entry level villa for Sidra and the accommodation comprises of :
Ground floor :
Entrance hall, powder room, maid’s room, good fitted kitchen, dining room and living room.
First floor :
Landing area, master bedroom with walk in wardrobe and en-suite bathroom, two further bedrooms sharing a jack and jill shower room.
Outside there is an area of garden to the rear of the property and covered parking for two cars to the front.
With its central pool, park and scattered further children’s play areas, Sidra is the the place to be for families in Dubai.
Please call Martin +971567898722 or email martin@phrealestate.ae for further information or to arrange a viewing.']

This villa is situated close to the pool and park offering a great location for families.* Type I.* 3 Bedrooms + Maid's room.* BUA: 2,239 sq. ft.* Close to the Park.* Back to Back Location\xa0Residents will become part of an exotic\xa0neighbourhood that features an exclusive desert botanical park, camping facilities, sand surfing and camel riding trails, go karting track, dune buggies, rock climbing wall, and a skate park.\xa0A residents\x92 club, restaurants and cafes, nurseries and primary schools, dedicated jogging and bicycle paths, a cricket pitch and several football fields, a miniature golf course, and an\xa0amphitheatre outdoor cinema are all set within the neighbourhood.\xa0To view this or similar properties in Mira Oasis and the surrounding areas, please call our area specialist and get all the information on this community and others."]
